name: String-bean
body:
# String Bean The featherweight responsive CSS Framework based on a 16-point system, rhather than the traditional 12-point system that other frameworks use. The extra 4 break points give you greater control over the widths of content on your site. Sometimes 12 is just too few, especially on a high resolution screen, such as 4K - at 4K String Bean comes into its own! ## Examples #### Simple Header Layout

String Bean

Powering the internet, gently.

#### Buttons Login Register #### Grid
  • Box #1
  • Box #2
  • Box #3
    • As simple as that! You should also check out the button functionality.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
